page.title: 16INDUSTRY
page.content: At Hillborough there is a{Factory} belonging to a Firm who specialise in the manufacture of{Ticket Vending {Machines}and tickets for them. The firm's products are used by{British {Rail,}the London Underground. Bus Companies, Theatres, Car Parks, Etc. Vending machines are made at Hillborough, amd the tickets for them are printed at another works 17,000, 000 a day in fact. An engineering plant of one sort or another has been on this site for the last forty years, but the present activity is very new. The Firm was formed by the merger of several small companies after a Major Shipbuilding Company was nationalised. The{Work force}is about 150 at the moment.
